title: Gyazo
body:

me and 2 people got disconnected and now I can't join back, I asked someone in game and they said they were playing. I dont wanna get a afk leaverbuster.

replies.body: The same shits happening to me now D:

RESTART YOUR PC

  YOUR PC DIDNT OPEN UP LEAGUE OF LEGEND PROPERLY SO IT SAID THAT. PLEASE GOSH RESTART YOUR PC AND IT SHOULD FIX IT!
Just tried that and got into anther queue, it still happened. This is on Riot's side, and I hope they are fixing it right now.
Can you tell us why you titled the thread with the name of the image host you happened to be using today?
